snippet: GREENWALD--Irwin Daniel. Sept. 6, 1918 - Feb. 17, 2013 Dad, It has been three years since your passing and not a day goes by when you are not uppermost in our hearts and minds. We miss your wisdom, warmth and gentle ways especially when times are difficult. You would continue to be so proud of your grandsons, Sam and Evan, as well as their wives, Randi and Carolyn, and you would derive such overwhelming pleasure from your great-grandchildren, Brett, Brooke, Riley and Isla. Mom and I believe that Louie and Licorice are by your side. We love you. Your wife, Doris and daughter, Ronny 1/3
lead_paragraph: GREENWALD--Irwin Daniel. Sept. 6, 1918 - Feb. 17, 2013 Dad, It has been three years since your passing and not a day goes by when you are not uppermost in our hearts and minds. We miss your wisdom, warmth and gentle ways especially when times are difficult. You would continue to be so proud of your grandsons, Sam and Evan, as well as their wives, Randi and Carolyn, and you would derive such overwhelming pleasure from your great-grandchildren, Brett, Brooke, Riley and Isla. Mom and I believe that Louie and Licorice are by your side. We love you. Your wife, Doris and daughter, Ronny 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  GREENWALD, IRWIN DANIEL
